ABOUT_PAGE.FIRST_P: The Anfitrion began to be idealized around mid-2017 with the purpose of showing only nightclubs, but with the onset of the 2020 pandemic, many clubs became bars. Thus, it was necessary to broaden our perspective to showcase more places like bars, wine cellars, sweet shops, and coffee shops. This way, we were able to reach more profiles.
ABOUT_PAGE.SECOND_P: Our purpose is to help locals but especially tourists, preventing people from having to search for establishments, people, or services one by one on social media, often needing to resolve a question or find some information.
ABOUT_PAGE.THIRD_P: The Gastronomic Street of Santos has 23 establishments, and we provide a summary of the street according to the person's needs: places with live music, pet-friendly spots, and more. We also look for Japanese food rodizios in the city and show a summary with prices.
ABOUT_PAGE.FOURTH_P: In short, we save time for locals and tourists.
